naslov: Trogir, impozantna rohbau stambena zgrada, odlična prilika, 544 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Raskošna četveroetažna kuća u Trogiru s 544 kvadrata stambene površine, uz mogućnost postavljanja galerije u visokom potkrovlju s dodatnih 16-20 kvadrata stambenog prostora. Kuća je u rohbau stanju, djelomično namještena na drugom katu i krasi je vrlo lijepi pogled na Trogir i more s viših etaža. Sveukupno sadrži pet stanova, od toga dva u prizemlju, i po jedan na svakoj od gornjih etaža. U prizemlju se nalazi jedan jednosoban i jedan dvosoban stan, svaki sa svojim dnevnim boravkom i kupanicom, te hodnik i stubište. Prvi, drugi i treći kat dijele prostore istog tlocrtnog smještaja i površina: uz stubište i ulazni hodnik, tu su po tri spavaće sobe, kupaonica, centralni hodnik, ostava, WC, prostrani dnevni boravak s polukružnim pogledom napolje, vrlo komforan kuhinjski prostor, po jedna manja i jedna veća natkrivena terasa te balkon. Kuća je vrlo čvrste konstrukcije izgrađene po svim važećim normama i priključena je na svu potrebnu infrastrukturu. Odlikuje se s obiljem okolnog prostora (parkirna mjesta za 15-ak vozila!) a postoji mogućnost do-kupnje susjedne čestice s dodatnih 566 kvadrata zemljišnog prostora. Kuća je orijentirana na sunčanu južnu stranu te na zapadnu stranu sa zalaskom sunca. Vrlo je blizu centra grada (10 minuta hoda) i na samo 5 km od aerodroma. Izuzetno je povoljne cijene i odlična prilika za ulaganje u impozantnu obiteljsku kuću odnosno u stanove ili apartmane za iznajmljivanje. --- Opulent four-story house in Trogir with 544 square meters of living space, and the possibility of building a gallery in the high attic with an additional 16-20 square meters of living space. The house is in rohbau condition, partially furnished on the second floor and features a very nice view of Trogir and the sea from the upper floors. In total, it contains five apartments, two of which are on the ground floor, and one on each of the upper floors. On the ground floor there is a one-bedroom and a two-bedroom apartment, each with its own living room and bathroom, plus the hallway and staircase. The first, second and third floors share spaces with the same layout and measurements: along with the staircase and the entrance hall, each comprises three bedrooms, bathroom, central hallway, storage room, toilet, spacious living room with semi-circular view of the outside, very comfortable kitchen area, one smaller and one larger covered terrace and a balcony. The house is characterized by very solid construction built on all applicable standards and is connected to all necessary infrastructure. It includes an abundance of surrounding space (parking spaces for approx. 15 vehicles!) and there is a possibility of acquiring adjacent parcel with additional 566 square meters of land space. The house is oriented to the sunny south side as well as to the west, sunset side. It is very close to the city center (10 minutes walk) and only 5 km from the airport. It is very affordable and a great opportunity to invest in an imposing family house, or in rental flats or apartments.
